name: Otona no Ikkyuu-san
synopsis: An adult comedy series following the life of Ikkyuu, a monk.

name: Otoshidama
synopsis: A music video for the song "Otoshidama" by Hikari Ishida. Aired as part of NHKs Minna no Uta program.

name: Otsuki-sama to Oujo
synopsis: Sachiko is unhappy and doesnt have a lot of energy. One day, a white rabbit appears and takes her to the "Land of the Moon." There, she meets her "true self," a happy and healthy girl, and Sachiko realizes she can be just like her.

name: Ou-sama Ninatta Kitsune
synopsis: A short puppet animation movie by Tadahito Mochinaga.

name: Ougon Senshi Gold Lightan
synopsis: When a young boy called Hiro finds what appears to be a broken lighter in an empty field, it changes his life forever. This lighter is actually the Gold Lightan, a robot that fell to Earth from the Robot Dimension. When called upon to defend the Earth from Ivalda the Greats evil robots, Gold Lightan transforms into a giant super robot, known as the Golden Warrior. Gold Lightan joins forces with Hiros and his gang, the One Pack Rangers to protect the Earth from the evil schemes of Ivalda the Great and his armored forces.

name: Ousama Monogatari
synopsis: Stop-motion animation made out of fabric following a curious king sneaking out of his castle.

name: Ousama no Shippo
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name: Owanko
synopsis: He wears a bowl on his head and dances to the rhythms of Samba! What in the world is this creature? It is Owanco! He is a fairy dog who wears a bowl like a hat.He loves food so much that he transforms himself into whatever food he pleases. His biggest fan and the admirer of tea-cupped-poodle, "Pooko-chan" and his rival cat, "Nori-Tama" (Nori=seaweed, Tama=the most typical name for cats in Japan) will join the fun ride.By the way, whats for dinner tonight?(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Oyo Neko Bunyan
synopsis: Bad-tempered fat cat Oyoyo charms his idiot human family but fights an ongoing battle with other neighborhood pets.(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

name: Oyone to Mattsan: Ai no Uta
synopsis: A story set in the countryside of Japan. Two teens meet and slowly fall in love. Their relationship has difficulties developing as her father doesnt approve of the boys request for her hand in marriage. Part of the OVA features a karaoke-style songs with lyrics present on-screen.

name: Oz no Mahoutsukai no Koutsuu Anzen no Tabi
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety staring the The Wizard of Oz cast.

name: Ozmafia!! Special
synopsis: Ozmafia!! special included with the 1st volume of the DVD/BD.

name: Pa-Pa-Pa the ★ Movie: Perman
synopsis: An origins and highlight film showing how Mitsuo met the alien that gave him the equipment to become a superhero (which for some reason was never explicitly shown in the two main anime, both just start with Mitsuo already having the powers), how he works together with the other Permans, and the rowdy fight with the antagonists.Screened simultaneously with Doraemon Movie 24: Nobita to Fushigi Kaze Tsukai.

name: Pa-Pa-Pa the ★ Movie: Perman - Tako de Pon! Ashi wa Pon!
synopsis: Dr. Octo who researches octopodes decides to take over the world as he deems the eight legged creatures a more suitable master species than humans. To do this, he takes an idol singer Sumire Hoshino (aka Perman #3) hostage. Mitsuo Suwa (aka Perman #1) likes the idol dearly (as he doesnt know the real identity of his Perman partner) and becomes so angry that he transforms to go rescue her. But fighting a giant octopus is more challenging than it looks!Screened simultaneously with Doraemon Movie 25: Nobita no Wan Nyan Jikuudeni and Doraemon Anniversary 25.

name: Paboo & Mojies
synopsis: Paboo is a fun loving and curious boy panda, and he and his group of larger-than-life friends explore and problem-solve in their quirky, imaginative and sometimes zany world! Each episode sees the Mojies (Japanese for letters of the alphabet) and Pappy (the Mojies book fairy of course!) help Paboo to discover the Magic Word and solve the problem of the day!(Source: Nelvana)

name: Pac-World
synopsis: We follow the daily events of Pac as he saves Pac-World. Together with his friends Cyli and Spiral, Pac and his buds face the issues of being teenagers while also protecting Pac-World from a ghostly army led by the evil Betrayus. Pac-Worlders do not want Betrayus and his ghostly minions returning from the Netherworld and wreaking havoc. So, President Spheros teaches Pac and his pals the legend prophesizing a round yellow Pac-Worlder rescuing the planet. Pac, the only round yellow citizen, is the man for the job. Each adventure follows Pac and his friends as they try to return the ghosts to Netherworld, saving Pac-World.(Source: AniDB)

name: Pachislo Kizoku Gin
synopsis: Ginya Otonashi is a college dropout who works part-time for a pachislot publishing company while aspiring to become a novelist. One day, Ginya comes across a secret organization and gets pulled into a competition to become #1 in "Pachi Battle," which is all a part of the Slotseum, a pachislot competition.(Source: ANN)

name: Padak Padak
synopsis: A mackerel from the sea attempts to escape from a restaurant! Padak is a mackerel from the sea, who is caught in a net and gets dumped into a restaurant tank. An old flatfish is the only one thats survived very long. He gains the trust of other fish with his survival skills. Thanks to Padak, who attempts to make it back to the ocean, the peace in the tank is shattered and conflicts with the old flatfish get bigger and bigger.(Source: IMDb)

name: Panda no Taputapu
synopsis: A short anime featuring the zodiac animals with a panda named Taputapu as the main character. Each episode is focuses on having a proverb, moral, or uplifting value.

name: Paniponi
synopsis: A slice of life anime about a bunch of animals living in Paniponi village.

name: Panpaka Pants
synopsis: A series of shorts about pigs who wear underpants.

name: Panpaka Pants Movie: Bananan Oukoku no Hihou
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name: Panpaka Pants O-New!
synopsis: Follows a pig whose familys mission is to collect underpants.

name: Panpaka Pants W-O-New!
synopsis: Sequel to Panpaka Pants O-New!. It follows a young underwear-wearing pig and his adventures.

name: Pants Pankurou
synopsis: A series of minute-long animated shorts that aired on Japanese public television. Aimed at toddlers and young children, the comedic series is mostly about toilet training.

name: Papa Mama Bye Bye
synopsis: Dungaree-wearing teenage tomboy Kaori lives next door to the brothers Ko and Yasu. One day as Kaori is walking to school, a US jet crashes near the boys house. Based on the "1977 Yokohama F-4 crash" real life incident. (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

name: Paper Cranes Story: Kenta to Maiko
synopsis: Based on the picture eBook of the same name.One by one, with feeling, the Thousand Paper Cranes are folded.What if, those paper cranes had a "life" of their own...The purpose given to the Thousand Paper Cranes!The spectacular adventure of Kenta and Maiko begins now!!(Source: dreamonefilm)

name: Paper Film
synopsis: A short animation by Taku Furukawa.

name: Paradise
synopsis: "A highly energetic story told from outer space, battlefields, and dentist offices, over and around time and space."(Source: Image Forum Festival 2014 program)

name: Paris no Isabelle
synopsis: The principal character is 15-year-old Isabelle Laustin, other characters being her parents Leon and Marie, Isabelles friends Jean and his sister Marie, and Isabelles suitor, Captain Victor.When Paris is besieged and Napoleon IIIs army is defeated, Isabelle escapes to London, disguised as a boy, and engages in secret agent stuff.(Source: AniDB)

name: Pata Pata Mama
synopsis: Music video for the song Pata Pata Mama by Ikuyo Inoko (猪子育代) that was featured on the Fuji TVs show "Hirake! Ponkikki."

name: Patalliro Saiyuuki! Special
genre: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Shoujo, Shounen Ai
synopsis: Unaired episode 27 of Patalliro Saiyuuki! that was included in the 5th DVD volume.

name: Patchin shite! Obaachan
synopsis: The story takes place in Kanazawa and tells the story of Yasue, an old woman who suddenly became very ill, her whole body paralyzed. She is told by her doctor she only has two weeks to live...

name: Patta Potta Monta
synopsis: Three monkey brothers from the from an urban city go to live in the countryside. Theres no convenience store nor arcades there; truly bare-bones. The story follows their daily lives trying to make friends and have fun amongst the villagers.

name: Patty & Jimmy no Kimikoso Superstar
synopsis: Jimmy is having trouble with pitching a baseball; Patty finds a way to encourage Jimmy to do better.

name: Pâtisserie no Monster
synopsis: Pâtisserie no Monster focuses on the titular monster Powan, the owner of a small pastry shop in France.

name: Peach Command Shin Momotarou Densetsu
synopsis: A continuation of Momotarou Densetsu.

name: Pecola
synopsis: Pecola is an orphaned penguin who lives with Pecolias, his Grandfather. Cube Town is an isolated small coastal village with such features as an art museum, beach, lighthouse (which has the number 36 above its entrance) and canal. It is located adjacent to Crescent Bay surrounded by the Rookery Mountains coastal range and served by regular ships (including a weekly freighter) that deliver mail, foodstuffs and other supplies plus occasional tourists from a nearby large metropolis named Cubic City. The heights above it lead into Glacier Valley which is snowbound even during summer. (Source: Wikipedia)

name: Peeban
synopsis: The episodes follow a pig named Peeban and his friends.

name: Peeping Life 5.0ch
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name: Peeping Life Movie: We Are The Hero
synopsis: Movie of Peeping Life.

name: Peeping Life x IODATA: Quiz!! Input Output
synopsis: A collaboration with the Peeping Life franchise and I-O Data (a Japanese computer peripheral manufacturer).

name: Peeping Life x Kaijuu Sakaba Kaiji: Kaijuu-tachi ga Iru Tokoro
synopsis: Peeping Life collaboration with Kaijuu Sakaba, a real tavern where kaijuu costumes from the Ultraman franchise are on display. Events are held where people can dine with the actors dressed in the kaijuu costumes.This Peeping Life collaboration was in honor of Kaijuu Sakabas grand re-opening in Kawasaki and opening of a second tavern in Osaka and focuses on the kaijuus daily lives outside of fighting Ultraman.

name: Peeping Life x Kids Station
synopsis: In honor of Peeping Lifes broadcast on Kids Station, three CMs were made for the TV channel.

name: Peeping Life x Sanyo
synopsis: A Peeping Life and Sanyo collaboration made to promote Sanyos summer ocean themed pachinko line with a Momotarou Densetsu pachinko game machine.

name: Peeping Life: Gekijou Original-ban
synopsis: The Peeping Life comedy anime series spawned five shorts for Japanese theaters. Each of the five shorts was running on the lobby monitors in T-Joys theater chain for two weeks before being replaced by the next short. In Tokyos Shinjuku Wald 9 cinema complex the shorts were run on the complexs actual theater screens. They were then included in the Peeping Life: The Perfect Emotions DVD release.

name: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro - Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland
synopsis: An incarnation of the Peeping Life franchise covers Tezuka anime characters and Tatsunoko Production anime characters such as Princess Sapphire and Casshern.

name: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro - Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland ONA
synopsis: 4 Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro - Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland episodes that did not make it to the official DVD.

name: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro - Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland Specials
synopsis: 2 bonus episodes done as a part of the 100th Anniversary campaign video collaboration with Universal Studios. Episode 1 features E.T. and episode 2 features Jaws.

name: Peeping Life: The Perfect Explosion
synopsis: Another iteration in the Peeping Life franchise.

name: Peeping Life: The Perfect Explosion Specials
synopsis: Specials included on the DVD release of Peeping Life: The Perfect Explosion that focus on Otaku-kun talking about "Celebrating Universals 100th Anniversary" and Otaku-kun interacting with a animegao kigurumi performer in "Madeleine and the Pocket Tissues."

name: Peeping Life: The Perfect Extension Specials
synopsis: Specials included on Peeping Life: The Perfect Extension OVA, these were not considered a part of the normal episode count of the OVA. Both episodes follow Otaku-kun as he reviews Hoshi wo Ou Kodomo and Planzet.

name: Peeping Life: TV Asahi Josei Announcer Collab
synopsis: In honor of Peeping Lifes broadcast on TV Asahi, a special episode was made featuring Otaku-kun and a female announcer from the TV station.

name: Pelican Road Club Culture
synopsis: High School boy Kenichi Watanabe is crazy about his MBX50 motorcycle. He and his buddies organize a motorcycle club, which they call Culture.

name: Peng You Town
synopsis: In a small provincial town, three children play football but when they hear breaking glass, two of them flee; leaving a little girl to investigate. She finds that she has broken a fish bowl and a small fish is flapping on the ground gasping for its life. What will the girl do to save this poor creature?

name: Penguin no Mondai
synopsis: About the daily lives of a boy and his talking penguin.

name: Penguin no Mondai DX?
synopsis: The continuation of Penguin no Mondai Max.

name: Penguin no Mondai Max
synopsis: The continuation of Penguin no Mondai.

name: Penguin no Mondai Movie
synopsis: Penguin no Mondai Movie.

name: Penguin's Memory: Shiawase Monogatari
synopsis: Mike is a penguin soldier who returns home after being injured during combat. Estranged from his family and friends, he leaves his hometown and starts to roam adrift through the country.(Source: ANN)

name: PePePePengiin
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name: Pepsi Nex x 009 Re:Cyborg
synopsis: A collaboration project between 009 Re:Cyborg and Pepsi Nex, which features characters from the former fighting over the drink.

name: Perman: Birdman ga Yatte Kita!!
synopsis: Screened as a triple feature with Doraemon: Nobita no Kaitei Kiganjou and Ninja Hattori-kun: Nin Nin Furusato Daisakusen no Maki.(Source: AniDB)

name: Perman: Copy World no Nazo
synopsis: Perman (1983) specials that were not included in the episode count when the show originally aired. The DVD Box set did include the latter two (Bird Sei e no Michi and Copy World no Nazo) as a part of the ep count as episode 222 and 415 respectively, bumping up the shows total ep count to 528 for its release.

name: Perrine Monogatari Movie
genre: Drama, Historical, Shoujo, Slice of Life
synopsis: Movie version of the TV series Perrine Monogatari.

name: Perrine Monogatari Specials
genre: Drama, Historical, Kids, Shoujo, Slice of Life
synopsis: A summary of the full series aired as a TV specials.

name: Persia no Komoriuta: Watashi no Hana
synopsis: Music video featured on NHKs Minna no Uta program.

name: Peter Pan no Bouken Specials
synopsis: A summary of the full series aired as a TV specials.

name: Petit Petit Muse
synopsis: Two twins, Ara and Ari, aspire into the world of fashion. Ara wants to become a fashion model, while her sister, Ari, wants to become a fashion designer. They meet a man named Yorang, who is the fashion designer in Heaven.

name: Phantasm
synopsis: Enter Taro Shinkais captivating dreamworld.

name: Phantom Yuusha Densetsu
synopsis: Yazawa, a Japanese pilot, suffers a crash in his Phantom jetfighter. After a six month recovery, his old friend from an airplane magazine wants him to investigate the appearance of a Phantom in an armed conflict in El Salvador. Yazawas investigations makes him wind up in an international arms conspiracy. Based on a series of military fiction novels.

name: Pi Po Pa Po Patrol-kun
synopsis: Patrol-kun is a talking police car, existing in a world where talking vehicles and humans live together. He starts his first day at a police station meeting up with his partner, a human police recruit by the name of Hajime. Together, they patrol the streets of Tokyo, learning various life lessons along the way.

name: Pic-lele
synopsis: Five anthropomorphic animal friends bond over their ukulele training. Aired as part of TOKYO MXs "Everybody! Nico Rich" show.

name: Picchipichi Shizuku-chan
synopsis: Third season of Pururun! Shizuku-chan.

name: Pichiko Dakyuubu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name: Pichiko Dakyuubu USA-hen
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name: Pikaia!
synopsis: The story begins in the future when Earth itself is no longer inhabitable by living creatures. Humans began their interstellar migration with space colonies. Vince and Hana work as researchers in the Cambrian Project. Together with the creature Pikaia, they seek the Lost Code, the key to restoring Earth, and aim to return to Cambrian-era Earth.(Source: ANN)

name: PikkaPika Summer
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name: Pinch to Punch
synopsis: A comedy about two goofy twins in the armed forces.(Source: AniDB)

name: Pink Lady Monogatari: Eikou no Tenshi-tachi
synopsis: Based on the real life-story of Pink Lady, a female pop duo that rose to superstardom in the mid-1970s.(Source: ANN)

name: Pink Lady Monogatari: Eikou no Tenshitachi Recaps
synopsis: Omnibus/compilation episodes of the main series that aired on TV right after the main series finished broadcasting sometimes known as episode 34 & 35.

name: Pinky Monkey no Umareta Hi
synopsis: Produced by Kenji Eno, commissioned by Frente International, this short shows the birth of Pinky.

name: Pinky Monkey x FaFa Collaboration Animation: At Afternoon of Sunny Day
synopsis: A collaboration anime between Frente Internationals Pinky candy mascot and Nissan Soaps Fafa laundry mascot.North American viewers may recognize Fafa under a different name "Snuggle". The mascot for the fabric softener brand owned by Sun Products.

name: Pinky Wakuwaku Tabi Stroll
synopsis: A promotional anime for Frente Internationals Pinky candy featuring their [pink] monkey mascot bring happiness through the power of Pinky candy in honor of the Pinky Citron Mint flavour release.

name: Pipi Tobenai Hotaru
synopsis: Based on the fairy tale novel series by Akira Ozawa (小沢昭巳).

name: Piroppo
synopsis: Piroppo is a short series commisioned by Sony for the promotion of their robot dog Aibo. Apparently 54 slots of about 20 seconds each were made, but the dvd release totals 23 named episodes.Created by ISHII Katsuhito, director of Trava Fist Planet and several of the Grasshoppa live action projects, this is a highly original project despite the limited budget.(Source: AniDB)

name: Pittanko! Nekozakana
synopsis: On a distant southern island, a fish (sakana) opened its mouth for a cat (neko), thus "nekozakana" (cat-fish) is born.(Source: ANN)

name: Pittanko! Taiyou-sensei to Pittanko
synopsis: Two school children disrupt the shape of their sun teacher.

name: Piyo no Ongaeshi
synopsis: A music video for the song by Junko Iwao that was featured on NHKs Minna no Uta Program.

name: Planetarium Chibi Maruko-chan, Hoshi ni Negai wo
genre: Comedy, Kids, School, Slice of Life
synopsis: The Konica Minolta "Tenkuu" Planetarium in Tokyo Skytree Town will run a Chibi Maruko-chan planetarium show from July 18 to August 31. The show, titled "Planetarium Chibi Maruko-chan, Hoshi ni Negai wo" (Planetarium Chibi Maruko-chan, Wish Upon a Star), celebrates the 25th anniversary of the Chibi Maruko-chan anime since it first aired in January 1990.(Source: ANN)

name: Platonic Chain: Ansatsu Jikkouchuu
synopsis: A DVD-only story that replaces episode 16 ("Oyaji Camera") of the TV series. There is a system where anyone can submit a picture of a person that annoys them for 100 yen. When a million photos of the same person are collected, a killer is hired for the resulting 100.000.000 yen.

name: Play Ball 2nd
synopsis: A continuation of the Play Ball TV series.

name: Plus 50000-nen
synopsis: A short movie by Otogi Production.

name: Pochacco no Jack to Mame no Ki
synopsis: Pochacco stars in a recreation of the story of Jack and the Beanstalk.

name: Pochacco no Ninjin Hata wa Oosawagi
synopsis: Pochacco and friends open up a carrot land together. One day, they find that all carrots are stolen by someone. Because of this event, they start to suspect each other. Who is the thief?

name: Pochacco no Wakuwaku Birthday
synopsis: Its the day before Pochaccos birthday and hes skateboarding around looking for his friends. He hopes to have a grand party with them the next day, but they all seem busy!

name: Poka Poka Mori no Rascal
synopsis: Rascal is an energetic racoon, who lives in a secret forest called "The Snag Forest".Although sometimes his mother scolds him when he does mischief, the engaging and kind personality of Rascal always makes him popular in the forest.This series depicts everyday adventures of Rascal, and his cheerful friends such as Rilulu, a cute girl racoon, Rockn, a skunk who loves to play music, Iggy, a mouse who always eats nuts and a lot more!!(Source: AniDB)

name: Pokopon no Yukai na Saiyuuki
genre: Adventure, Fantasy, Kids, Magic, Martial Arts
synopsis: Pokopon version of Journey to the West.

name: Pom Pom Purin no Kitakaze to Taiyou
synopsis: Pom Pom Purin recreates the story of The Northwind and the Sun.
